DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study compare performance three soft bifocal contact lenses term vision provide lens .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Three Soft Bifocal Contact Lenses
DOC.criteria: The subject must 35 70 year age . The subject must respond positively least one symptom `` Presbyopic Symptoms Questionnaire '' already wear presbyopic contact lens correction ( e.g . read spectacle contact lens , multifocal monovision contact lenses etc. ) . The subject 's spherical equivalent distance refraction must range 1.00 6.00 eye . Refractive cylinder must less equal 0.75 D eye . The subject must add power +0.75D +2.50D eye . The subject must best correct visual acuity 20/203 good eye . The subject 's must least 20/30distance vision study contact lenses . The subject must agree comfortable vision prior dispense study lens . The subject must adapt soft contact lens wearer eye . The subject must appear able willing adhere instruction set forth clinical protocol . The subject must read sign STATEMENT OF INFORMED CONSENT provide copy form . Ocular systemic allergy disease may interfere contact lens wear . Systemic disease , autoimmune disease use medication , may interfere contact lens wear . Clinically significant ( grade 3 4 ) corneal edema , corneal vascularization , corneal stain abnormality cornea , may contraindicate contact lens wear . Clinically significant ( grade 3 4 ) tarsal abnormality might interfere contact lens wear . Any ocular infection . Any corneal distortion result previous hard rigid gas permeable contact lens wear . Pregnancy lactation Any infectious disease ( e.g. , hepatitis , tuberculosis ) contagious immunosuppressive disease ( e.g. , HIV ) . History diabetes . History binocular vision abnormality strabismus .
